verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to me, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H5927>set<s%> up their <S%H1544>idols<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> their <S%H6440>face:<s%> should I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of at all by them?

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5927>sets<s%> up his <S%H1544>idols<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7760>puts<s%> the stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him that <S%H935>comes<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1544>idols;<s%>

That I may <S%H8610>take<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from me through their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H7725>Repent,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves from your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> away your <S%H6440>faces<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

For <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself from me, and <S%H5927>sets<s%> up his <S%H1544>idols<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7760>puts<s%> the stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H935>comes<s%> to a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of him concerning me; I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him by myself:

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and will <S%H8074>make<s%> him a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H6601>deceived<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> a <S%H1697>thing,<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H6601>deceived<s%> that <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on him, and will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> him from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall be even as the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of him that <S%H1875>seeks<s%> to him;

That the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H8582>go<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> from me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H2930>polluted<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> but that they may be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I may be their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> against me by <S%H4603>trespassing<s%> <S%H4604>grievously,<s%> then will I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on it, and will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> thereof, and will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> on it, and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it:

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and <S%H347>Job,<s%> were in it, they should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> but their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H3863>If<s%> I cause <S%H7451>noisome<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they <S%H7921>spoil<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> that it be <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> that <S%H1097>no<s%> man may <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2416>beasts:<s%>

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were in it, as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> they shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>neither<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> they <S%H905>only<s%> shall be <S%H5337>delivered,<s%> but the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> if I <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on that <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2719>Sword,<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> that I <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it:

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were in it, as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> they shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> nor <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but they <S%H905>only<s%> shall be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> themselves.

<S%H176>Or<s%> if I <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> that <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on it in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast:<s%>

Though <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and Job <S%H347><s%>were in it, as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> they shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>neither<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> they shall but <S%H5337>deliver<s%> their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H7451>noisome<s%> <S%H2416>beast,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast?<s%>

Yet, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> therein shall be <S%H3498>left<s%> a <S%H6413>remnant<s%> that shall be <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H4163>forth,<s%> both <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to you, and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> and you shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> even <S%H854>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on it.

And they shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you, when you <S%H7200>see<s%> their <S%H1870>ways<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> in it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
